title.narrative: Palestinian legal frameworks introduced to prohibit torture

description.narrative: 1. Palestine joins the second Op CAT by the end of 2019; 2. 10% annual decrease in the percentage of people who reported being subject to torture

title.narrative: Detention centers, rehabilitation facilities and security forces comply with the International Human Rights Standards.
Detention centers, rehabilitation facilities and security forces comply with the International Human Rights Standards.
Targeted duty bears and rights holders in Palestine actively engage in human rights compliance.

description.narrative: 10% increase in adults’ awareness and knowledge of human rights and public freedom by 2019.

title.narrative: Torture violations are reduced

description.narrative: 30% increase of torture complaints addressed by ICHR with acceptable results according to ICHR classification of cases by 2019.

title.narrative: Accountability systems at state institutions are effective

description.narrative: 5% annual increase in the number public opinion cases, detention of journalists that are monitored by ICHR.

title.narrative: Local Government units providing services to marginalized communities are effective, accountable and transparent.

description.narrative: 60 field visits/meetings are conducted annually to monitor LGUs services provision and provide recommendations on effectiveness, accountability and transparency.

title.narrative: Progressive legislative, policy and institutional environment that safeguards Human Rights in Palestine and in conjunction with SDGs.

description.narrative: At least 60% of laws by decrees are issued on an adequate consultative basis including representatives of society & ICHR.

description.narrative: Awareness Strategy was finalized; 250,000 of Palestinian reached through ICHR awareness activities annually.

title.narrative: Regulations and policies issued in the form of laws by decrees related to social and economic and cultural rights are consistent with international conventions and treaties on human rights.

description.narrative: One new law\by law enacted annually towards the fulfilment of Palestine’s obligations under international HR treaties, with ICHR active involvement.

title.narrative: Progressive ratification, reporting and compliance with International Human Rights Mechanisms.

description.narrative: The State of Palestine accedes to additional 3 treaties 3 optional protocols, torture, death penalty and complaints of PWD; with focus on one optional protocol every year.
